attributes.review:
As Trump’s solider to keep America’s apocalypse in 2024 on schedule, I have to download this app.
This is greatest invention since the space force.
It allows me to attend every HUGE trump rally. 

At rally, they give out tremendous amounts of bleach and Plaquenil. It always psych myself up, and ready to take on all the peaceful protesters on the street. 

However, I have to downgrade the app and expecting they fix some minor issues. 1) why the app is not in Russian? 2) no images of the borders wall that block covid 19, I can see it from Alaska!
attributes.title: I am Trump’s Army!!

attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever used, it crashes and drained my battery! When I finally got it working it immediately asked for my address, photo, and credit card info. Why does our president need all of this information???
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted to see my baby Donald trump but I couldn’t because he wasn’t being nice he called me ugly and said I couldn’t go to the potty and I’m upset because I wanted to potty so instead I potty on his shirt and I burned his hat and he left me for Ivanka and Ivanka told me I wasn’t purrrty
attributes.title: Donald baby

attributes.review: This app keeps on giving me viruses! It really gave my phone the corona and the plague!!! Do not download! My phone is literally in the hospital, the doctors said that it won’t survive and that I’ll need to buy a new one! But I don’t have enough money, so don’t download this app! It’s the worst
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: After several days using the app to admire my savior Lord POTUS I stumbled into the View Terms and Policies link and to my surprise the Policies page was just a donation button and a place to describe the policy you would like passed? The Term section was a big number 1. thank god
attributes.title: Should have known

attributes.review: I am a life long Donald Trump supporter but this app is terrible. It might as well have stolen my identity. The app begged for my phone number AND personal information. I don’t want the government having that kind of control. If you’re considering this app please save yourself and your identity ✨🧚‍♂️💫😻💞
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Pls don’t get this, this app destroyed my whole phone and I had to get another one! And then the phone caught on fire! And if you get this it also hacks all of your info because ppl from chine have gotten into the app and made it corrupt!!!! Get this at your own risk!!! 🧚🏻💫🧚🏻‍♀️🌙💕
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS

attributes.review: I mean it really is the best app ever. A must have for anyone who loves America. Help President Trump KAG and download this flawless app.
attributes.title: App worthy of the Greatest President in History

attributes.review: Love this App. Wish the Claim Your Daily Bonus still worked.
attributes.title: From the Horse’s Mouth!

attributes.review: I was really hoping for a quality app to stay up to date on current events and campaign efforts but Trump 2020 hasn’t delivered. The app glitches and it takes forever to load. I’m extremely disappointed in the app.
attributes.title: It’s Just Not That Great
